layout.name: whitelist
layout.title: White List
layout.tooltip:
The reaper will only scan for NPCs with matching ID. You can multiple IDs by seperating them by commas, ex 1, 2, 3
If left blank, all NPCs will be scanned

layout.name: filter
layout.title: Advanced Filter
layout.tooltip: Use custom lua code to filter out the object being scanned.
layout.value-default:
-- Use the variable: npc to make your code
-- Use the return keyword to decide if it passes the filter
-- Just do 'return true' to ignore the filter
return true
